about_the_game:
The plot tells about the vigilant creature destroyer Nadia's hunt for the head of a certain sinister member of the Calisto family, whose members are mystics scientists. The Calisto family, in an attempt to create a potion of immortality, flooded London with the walking dead and other monsters.
The atmosphere and music perfectly convey the gloomy spirit of the British capital of the twentieth century.

• Complete dismemberment, excellent enemy physics.

• The atmosphere of horror and hopelessness on the streets of London

• Fascinating story

• Many types of weapons

• Puzzle

• Various enemies and bosses

• 3 difficulty levels

• Various locations

• Victorian style

• Inventory management

• Survival-horror of the old school

content_descriptors.notes:
Attention! Viewer discretion is advised. The game
contains scenes of violence and blood.

short_description: Nightmare of Nady - is an old-school 90s survival-horror, third-person action game with fighting elements. Inspired by Van Helsing.
